title: About me
text:
üìö Reaching the end of my master studies in Electrical Engineering, Information Technology and Computer Engineering, at RWTH Aachen. There, I worked as a student assistant in the Institute of Hearing Technology and Acoustics (IHTA), formerly known as ITA, as a programmer for the Virtual Acoustics simulation software.
üéß Developed my master thesis in the Aalto Acoustics Lab at Aalto Univeristy in Helsinki, in a collaboration with the group of Virtual Acoustics from Aalto University and the PAAD research group from RWTH AAchen.

title: Sergio de las Heras
text:
Hola! I am Sergio de las Heras, MSc in Electrical Engineering, Information Technology and Computer Engineering by RWTH Achen University. In the last few years, I have been mostly focusing in acoustics and pyschoacoustics, working as as student assistant at IHTA and developing my master thesis in Aalto Acoustics Lab in Helsinki. I am currently based in Copenhagen, working as a research intern at Bang&Olufsen.
I studied my bachelors in Telecommunication Technologies Engineering at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid, before moving to Germany to pursue my masters degree. While in Madrid, I also studied clarinet, and became involved in university‚Äôs photography society where I discovered my passion for analog photography. I am also fond of cycling and adventure on my free time.
